Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amulet, Elixir, Sword, Tome

    public abstract class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the base class for all Item sub-types in the game world.

      • checkRadius

        public boolean checkRadius(double pX,
                           double pY,
                           int radius)
        Check if a position is within a radius to the object calling this method
        Parameters:
        pX - the x value of a position to check
        pY - the y value of the position to check
        radius - the maximum radius value
        Returns:
        true if the specified position is within the specified radius of the object calling this method
